For all who wonders why it has only 2gigs: yify uses mp4 with h.264 codec, which is much more efficient than xvid or something. But its also more cpu intensive, so you need better hardware to play it. And of course, only 2.1 audio. So 2GB 1080p rip doesn't necessarily means poor quality.
